beastMaster:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
beastMaster:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

beastMaster:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
beastMaster:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
beastMaster:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

beastMaster:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
beastMaster:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

beastMaster:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
beastMaster:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !beastMaster:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

beastMaster:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
beastMaster:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !beastMaster:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
